csharp.title: Task Management API
csharp.description: A RESTful API built with ASP.NET Core for managing tasks and projects. Features JWT authentication, Entity Framework integration, and comprehensive CRUD operations.

csharp.title: E-Commerce Desktop App
csharp.description: A Windows Forms application for small business inventory management. Includes product catalog, order processing, and sales reporting with local database storage.

csharp.title: Weather Monitoring Service
csharp.description: A background Windows service that monitors weather data from multiple APIs and sends alerts. Built with .NET Core and hosted as a Windows Service.

unity.title: 2D Platformer Adventure
unity.description: A classic 2D platformer game with multiple levels, collectibles, and enemy AI. Features smooth character movement, particle effects, and dynamic audio system.

unity.title: 3D Puzzle Game
unity.description: An immersive 3D puzzle game where players manipulate objects in space to solve increasingly complex challenges. Features dynamic lighting and physics-based interactions.

unity.title: Mobile Runner Game
unity.description: An endless runner game optimized for mobile devices. Features procedural level generation, power-ups, and social leaderboards integration.
